visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the title 'Live updating data'. The chart should have a subtitle 'Points above 10 trigger alert by screen reader'. The y-axis should range from 0 to 12 with a red plot line at y=10. The chart should include a single series named 'Random data' with initial data [1.1]. The chart should be accessible with an announcement formatter that announces points above 10. The chart should also have a button to start and stop live data updates.

subtitle.text: Points above 10 trigger alert by screen reader

visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object configures a spline chart with a title 'Live updating data' and a subtitle explaining the alert functionality for points above 10. The y-axis is set to range from 0 to 12, with a red plot line at y=10 to visually indicate the alert threshold. The chart includes a single series named 'Random data' with initial data [1.1]. Accessibility features are enabled to announce new data points, with a custom formatter that only announces points above 10. The chart is designed to be interactive, with a button to start and stop live data updates, simulating real-time data input.
